message.body: (1/2) Any interest in being interviewed about your dream journal / plugging your film on the hairpin? I totally realize your dream journal stuff is private but
(2/2) it's also cool and I bet people would be into it.
That sounds pretty cool. I'd be into that. What's the time frame? I'm shooting a book trailer Friday to Tuesday of next week. Lotsa pre pro but after that more time
Awesome. I can wait till after Tues. It's mostly an issue of what you want said. Also, is there a place I can see your film(s)?
Yes! I'll email you links and passwords when I get home tonight. It sounds really cool.
Great. It should be! I think the hairpin is prob a great place to find some new followers. I'm into what they do.
Are you writing for them a lot?! That's so exciting!
I don't know! I just got the We Want You email earlier today. Haven't worked out the finer points yet, but I am excited.
Congrats!!! That's so cool. Yeah let's kit and set up a time for the interview. Let me know if I can prepare for you in any way. I'll get some links to you
